intro: Kyllinga nigritana, commonly known as blackleaf spikerush, is a herbaceous plant native to tropical and subtropical regions. Kyllinga nigritana is often used in ecological restoration projects due to its ability to stabilize soil and provide habitat for aquatic organisms.
